titleStmt.title: An account of the articles drawn up here in England by the East-India-Company against the king of Siam and remitted to their servants in India as a just ground to make war on that prince : together with a full answer to every particular as 'twas prepar'd to have been address'd to the honourable the knights, citizens and burgesses in Parliament assembled / by Samuel White ; and is now most humbly presented to their judicious consideration by his brother George White.
titleStmt.author: White, Samuel, ca. 1650-1689.

titleStmt.title: An account of the articles drawn up here in England by the East-India-Company against the king of Siam and remitted to their servants in India as a just ground to make war on that prince : together with a full answer to every particular as 'twas prepar'd to have been address'd to the honourable the knights, citizens and burgesses in Parliament assembled / by Samuel White ; and is now most humbly presented to their judicious consideration by his brother George White.
titleStmt.author: White, Samuel, ca. 1650-1689.
White, George.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
